title: FS: 1909 T204 Ramly Art Devlin SGC 50
author: Orioles1954

posts.post_title: FS: 1909 T204 Ramly Art Devlin SGC 50
posts.post_content:
Just back from grading. Very nice 1909 T204 Ramly Art Devlin. Graded 50 VG-EX 4 by SGC and is crease-free with only slightly worn corners. Back is clean.
Asking $250 dlvd. including insurance.

James
